subject: RE: [junit] Running from jar file
msgSnippet: ... I don t see why not, although now that I think about it I ve never actually tried that myself.  Did you try it and it failed? Todd.
messageBody:
> I was wondering if its possible to run junit on classes
> that are in a jar file instead of just a plain directory?

I don't see why not, although now that I think about it I've never
actually tried that myself. Did you try it and it failed?


Todd.
